title: Pbe signups
body: So this month on the 4th they closed down pbe signups as they wanted to remake the site more functional for the future. Ive been periodically checking the pbe status and it still says signups are down even today as i just checked. I was wondering if we could get an update on when the site will be up and running again.

replies.body:
i wait 2 months and i cant take my pbe acc pls help me
{{champion:498}}
At the moment I don't have an exact date for when the sign ups will be back up. We're still working on smoothing that process out, but we'll be sure to post updates on when it will be open again!
